按疾病預防控制中心對冠狀病毒 (COVID-19) 防疫措施的指南, 教會仍暫停開放直至另行通知。請同來參與週日網上崇拜, 網上視頻頻道:

     https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCm4IAw-W-8tpKbcy5-bxeyA


以下的聚會已改為綫上, 有意參加者請電郵hccc@hccc.us與各組長聯絡:

  • 週日早上各成人主日學, 青少年主日崇拜
  • 週三晚上禱告會
  • 週五各查經團契

亨城華語基督教會歡迎您

Welcome to Huntsville Chinese Christian Church (HCCC)

本教會為不分宗派的基督教會，尊奉主耶穌基督獨一真神之名的屬靈聚集。 按神的心意傳揚基督福音，領人信靠耶穌歸向獨一真神。 依據聖經見證主道，並配搭事奉建立基督身體。 我們的主日崇拜是以華、英語進行，我們也有英語、華語、粵語團契。 歡迎您和我們一同敬拜主、在主裡團契，如果您住在亨城地區，或即將來到亨城，但願亨城華語基督教會成為您屬靈的家。 如果您是慕道朋友，我們盼望您能在這裡尋見真理，認識主耶穌基督。

HCCC is a non-denominational Christian church, a spiritual assembly that follows our Lord Jesus Christ for the accomplishment of His commission - to spread Christian gospel, to edify church members for the growth of our Lord’s body and to do the will of God.  The Holy Bible is the source of our testimony and teaching.  Together we serve to build up  Christ's body. Our Sunday worship is conducted in Mandarin and English. We have  English, Mandarin, and Cantonese fellowships. We welcome you to join us to worship God and have fellowship in the Lord. If you live Huntsville area, or will be coming to Huntsville, we hope HCCC will become your spiritual home. If you are gospel friends, we hope you can find the truth here and know the Lord Jesus Christ.

教會年度主題：活出敬拜的生活 
HCCC Yearly Theme: Living a life of true worship
1 Peter 2:1-5 
所以你們既除去一切的惡毒、詭詐、並假善、嫉妒、和一切毀謗的話、就要愛慕那純淨的靈奶、像纔生的嬰孩愛慕奶一樣、叫你們因此漸長、以致得救．你們若嘗過主恩的滋味、就必如此。主乃活石．固然是被人所棄的、卻是被神所揀選所寶貴的．你們來到主面前、也就像活石、被建造成為靈宮、作聖潔的祭司、藉著耶穌基督奉獻?神所悅納的靈祭。

Therefore, rid yourselves of all malice and all deceit, hypocrisy, envy, and slander of every kind. Like newborn babies, crave pure spiritual milk, so that by it you may grow up in your salvation, now that you have tasted that the Lord is good. As you come to him, the living Stone rejected by men but chosen by God and precious to him. You also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.
